channel.title: Some help with action buttons
channel.description: hi. I have quited rsps and started with basic java programming. a lot of my friends uses their phone to listen to music, play games, surf on the internet. so why don't i start of making apps for mobile phones? i'm moving along but then i stopped. i have every class and file ready but i don't know how i put in actionbutton so the button do something. im using netbeans 6.8 maybe 6.9 later if it works on linux. but if anyone could tell me how i put in a button with the name "youtube" and it would open youtube it would be nice... and a button like "more" and then another list comes up... thx hopw you guys can help me out :D

thanks… i’l ask if there is something i don’t understand

item.title: Some help with action buttons
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hi. I have quited rsps and started with basic java programming. a lot of my friends uses their phone to listen to music, play games, surf on the internet.
so why don’t i start of making apps for mobile phones? i’m moving along but then i stopped. i have every class and file ready but i don’t know how i put in actionbutton so the button do something. im using netbeans 6.8 maybe 6.9 later if it works on linux. but if anyone could tell me how i put in a button with the name “youtube” and it would open youtube it would be nice… and a button like “more” and then another list comes up… thx
hopw you guys can help me out

Read full topic
